similar_jobs: Backend Software Engineer Jobs in Canada
job_description:
We are looking for a candidate with solid frontend experience as well as some previous backend experience in any technology and a fundamental understanding of native cloud development. 
 Reporting To: Chief Architect 
Location: Toronto, Ontario (hybrid) 
Employee Type: Full-time 
Start Date: November 2023 
Eligibility: Work permit, Canadian Citizenship or Permanent Resident Status required 
  Responsibilities: 
Plan, develop, and maintain the core parts of the system, including frontend integration to the backend and utilization of cloud technologies in the backend. 
Work closely with the Product Owner to develop UX/UI from mockups. 
Plan and prioritize the upcoming work. 
  Requirements 
5+ years overall professional experience in software development, preferably in the web technologies space 
Experience and knowledge of React (hook, context and UI libraries) 
Experience and knowledge of TypeScript 
Experience with Cloud providers (Preferably with Azure) 
A strong understanding of APIs and knowledge of microservice patterns 
Good understanding of servereless compute 
Good understanding of data structures and experience 
Experience with source control (e.g. Git + Github) and modern software delivery techniques and tools, including pull requests and GitHub Actions 
Willingness to roll up your sleeves and get the job done 
  Impro.AI overview 
Impro.AI provides data-driven insights and tools that every executive needs to understand and optimize their company's management behavior. Leveraging the power of the world's best Generative AI systems alongside our own expert performance strategist and consultants, we help companies accelerate their growth by helping them realize new workforce insights and improve employee performance through a technology app. 
  Did you know that men will typically apply for a job when they meet only 60% of the qualifications, but women will often only apply if they meet 100% of them? Impro is committed to building a team that reflects the diversity of our customer base and thereby provides us with a competitive edge.  
If you are a dedicated team player committed to driving positive business outcomes and have the necessary qualifications, we would love to hear from you.
